title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Adaptive Mathematics Learning Utilizing Cultural Philosophy: Moral-Flexibility

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain math problem-solving strategies applying high-frequency idioms (e.g., 실사구시, 우공이산) through the MFLM model with 85% accuracy.
Learners complete 70% or more of group problem-solving tasks by applying idiom-based moral judgments (fairness, perseverance, etc.) in VR simulations.
Learners systematically document MFLM application cases in digital reflection journals to improve self-directed learning skills.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
